title: Healthcare website home page with Intake and Billing menus

requirements.text: Create a Home page for a healthcare web application that prominently displays a navigation menu with exactly two items: "Intake" and "Billing".

quotes: Creat am website for health care application having intake and billing named menu on home page

acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads successfully and shows a visible menu/navigation area.
Menu contains the items labeled exactly "Intake" and "Billing" (English text).
Clicking each menu item navigates to its respective page/route without a full page reload.

requirements.text: Implement an "Intake" page/route that is reachable from the Home page menu and displays a clear page header "Intake" and placeholder content indicating the section is for patient intake.

quotes: having intake ... named menu on home page

acceptanceCriteria: There is a navigable route/page titled "Intake".
The Intake page renders a header "Intake" and basic placeholder body text in English.
Users can navigate back to Home and then to Billing without errors.

requirements.text: Implement a "Billing" page/route that is reachable from the Home page menu and displays a clear page header "Billing" and placeholder content indicating the section is for billing.

quotes: ... and billing named menu on home page

acceptanceCriteria: There is a navigable route/page titled "Billing".
The Billing page renders a header "Billing" and basic placeholder body text in English.
Users can navigate between Intake and Billing using the menu/navigation.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive, healthcare-appropriate visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) consistently across Home, Intake, and Billing pages. Do not use a blue & purple color palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share consistent typography, spacing, and navigation styling.
The overall look feels like a healthcare application (clean, calm, professional).
Primary/secondary colors used are not a combination of blue and purple together as the main palette.

requirements.text: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI (e.g., logo in the top navigation and a hero image/illustration on the Home page). Do not serve these images from the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Images listed in imageRequirements.required exist at frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filenames.
Home page renders the hero image/illustration from the generated assets.
The navigation area renders the logo image from the generated assets.
No backend endpoints are used to fetch these static images.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; only add backend changes if strictly necessary for the requested UI.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose them instead.
nonGoals: Implementing real patient intake forms, data validation, or saving intake data to the backend.
Implementing billing calculations, invoices, payment processing, or Stripe integration.
Authentication/authorization flows (e.g., Internet Identity) unless explicitly requested later.

required: Minimal healthcare logo mark, clean line icon style, dark-on-light (healthcare-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Calm healthcare hero illustration with abstract shapes and clinic/patient-care motif, light background (healthcare-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
